title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: June 12, 2023, 02:29:54 PMLast edit: June 13, 2023, 01:22:27 PM by minerjones
content: For auction are 6x coins produced by maker RarityCheckEach coin is 0.999 silver with the 2x lower numbered ones being gold plated.Each coin is loaded with it's BTC face value and comes with matching COA**Each lot will be bid on by its coin number**STARTING BID LOTS 62,63,64,65: 0.0025BTCSTARTING BID LOTS 03,05: 0.0120BTC#062: https://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/address.dws?1LtutMTgWVtjqKYbANMv9YAdaHYUiih7Lz.htm#063: https://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/address.dws?1PpjAX2KjrotJ3tqeZxff3masqz2yEJa1J.htm#064: https://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/address.dws?1MpKxnztv11LExqMhxBuLg2sxJ3Fpf4AYN.htm#065: https://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/address.dws?1oFHECPCnhP8Ce29BvWhbun3VmMEg9u1z.htm#003: https://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/address.dws?16skZNYR1QTEYna4Ugatq4t9VJ76gMDLgW.htm#005: https://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/address.dws?1Eb4yGyXskQya3YsVXQAJewFsjkodJB3j6.htmSTARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JUNE 17th, 2023, 15:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
